snippet: A Brooklyn 13-year-old fell from his bicycle in Bensonhurst and was struck by a green Ford Explorer. The police are looking for the driver, who fled.
abstract: Brooklyn teenager Henry Garcia is killed after falling from his bicycle and being hit by a car; driver fled the scene.
lead_paragraph: A Brooklyn 13-year-old fell from his bicycle in Bensonhurst and was struck by a green Ford Explorer. The police are looking for the driver, who fled.

headline.seo: Boy Killed in Hit-and-Run in Brooklyn
headline.main: Car Hits and Kills a Boy in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Car Hits and Kills a Boy in Brooklyn
